{"id":1321263676,"question_id":6,"lang":"rust","lang_name":"Rust","time":"1 week, 4 days","timestamp":1721002903,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"3 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1321263676/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Zigzag Conversion","memory":"2.2 MB","code":"impl Solution {\n    pub fn convert(s: String, num_rows: i32) -> String {\n        let num_rows = num_rows as usize;\n        if num_rows == 1 {\n            return s;\n        }\n        let mut ss = vec![String::new(); num_rows];\n        let mut i = 0;\n        let mut to_down = true;\n        for c in s.chars() {\n            ss[i].push(c);\n            if to_down {\n                i += 1;\n            } else {\n                i -= 1;\n            }\n            if i == 0 || i == num_rows - 1 {\n                to_down = !to_down;\n            }\n        }\n        let mut res = String::new();\n        for i in 0..num_rows {\n            res += &ss[i];\n        }\n        res\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"zigzag-conversion","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
